{{html:

<div id="tabbable">
      <h1>Buckets List</h1>
      <a href="#/new" class="btn btn-info btn-large btnfull">Create Bucket</a>
      <table id="machine_buckets_list"  class="table table-striped table-bordered">
        <tr>
          <th>Image</th>
          <th>Name</th>
          <th>Status</th>
          <th>Plan</th>
          <th>Region</th>
        </tr>
        <tbody class="box menu-1">
          <tr ng-repeat="bucket in buckets">
            <td>{[bucket.image]}</td>
            <td>
              <a ng-href="#/edit/{[bucket.id]}">{[bucket.name]}</a>
            </td>
            <td>{[bucket.status]}</td>
            <td>{[bucket.plan]}</td>
            <td>{[bucket.region]}</td>
          </tr>
        </tbody>
      </table>
</div>
}}
